Triples

Series |

Quick Binge

  • OTT Release Date: 11 Dec 2020
  • Genre(s): Comedy, Drama
  • Language(s): தமிழ்
  • Director(s): Raghavan Jeyra, Charukesh Sekar
  • Cast(s): Jai , Rajkumar , Vivek Prasanna, Vani Bhojan, Madhuri Jain See all Cast & Crew
  • Music: Vishal Chandrasekhar,Ramachandran Anand
  • Similar To: Modern Love: Chennai, Ayali
  • Story:

    Triples is a Tamil Hotstar Special web series. The plot revolves around the life of three friends, they get involved in all sorts of things together. As love comes in their story takes a new turn, With few events which they witnessed make them an enemy to a gangster. Now they have to run to save their lives.

Triples - IMAGE GALLERY

STORY AND RATINGS

Story

Triples is a Tamil Hotstar Special web series. The plot revolves around the life of three friends, they get involved in all sorts of things together. As love comes in their story takes a new turn, With few events which they witnessed make them an enemy to a gangster. Now they have to run to save their lives.

Ratings

7.1/10

IMDb

TRIVIA

Trivia

Producer Karthik Subbaraj and director Charukesh Sekar noted that the show was written to match Crazy Mohan's style of writing. The characters names in the series are also a reference to Crazy Mohan's theatre sketches.
